trans-unit.source: Get all resource records from a given zone matching the provided StartRecordName (if given) or all records in the zone (if not), optionally filtered by a specific StartRecordType. This will return any and all RRs matching, regardless of their special AWS flavors (weighted, geolocation, alias, etc.) so your code should be prepared for potentially large numbers of records back from this function - for example, if you've created a complex geolocation mapping with lots of entries all over the world providing the same server name to many different regional clients.
trans-unit.target: 从给定区域中获取与所提供的StartRecordName(如果给定)或该区域中的所有记录(如果不给定)相匹配的所有资源记录,可选择通过特定的StartRecordType进行过滤。这将返回任何和所有匹配的RR,不管它们的特殊AWS风味(加权、地理定位、别名等),因此您的代码应该为从该函数返回的潜在大量记录做好准备--例如,如果您创建了一个复杂的地理定位映射,其中有很多条目在世界各地为许多不同的区域客户提供相同的服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: Given the above example, os_family matches will be processed first, with os matches processed after. This would have the effect of assigning smbd as the service attribute on Ubuntu minions. If the priority item was not defined, or if the order of the items in the priority tuple were reversed, Ubuntu minions would have a service attribute of samba, since os_family matches would have been processed second.
trans-unit.target: 在上述示例中，将先处理 os_family 匹配，然后再处理 os 匹配。这将在Ubuntu奴才上分配 smbd 作为 service 属性。如果未定义 priority 项，或者 priority 元组中的项顺序颠倒了，Ubuntu奴才将具有 samba 的 service 属性，因为 os_family 匹配项将被第二次处理。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 False ，则此函数将返回档案中的文件/目录列表。如果为 True ，它将返回一个字典，将路径分类为单独的键，这些键包含目录名称，文件名以及存档顶层中存在的目录/文件。

trans-unit.source: If True (default), takes the name from the id grain. If False, the provided name is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True （默认），则从 id 粒度获取名称。如果为 False ，则使用提供的名称。

trans-unit.source: If True a hard reset will be performed before the checkout and any uncommitted modifications to the working directory will be discarded. Untracked files will remain in place.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ,则将在签出之前执行硬重置，并且对工作目录的任何未提交的修改将被丢弃。未跟踪的文件将保留在原位。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则返回数据中将包含一个 API_Response 密钥，其中包含Docker API的原始输出。

trans-unit.source: If True, an error will be raised if any repo SLS files fails to process. If False, no error will be raised, and a dictionary containing the full results will be returned.

trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且必须初始化存储库，那么该存储库将是裸存储库。

trans-unit.source: If True, and if prune=True, then forcibly remove these images.

trans-unit.source: If True, and if the named container already exists, this will remove the existing container. The default behavior is to return a False result when the container already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且命名容器已经存在，则将删除现有容器。默认行为是当容器已经存在时返回 False 结果。

trans-unit.source: If True, and the source is a file from the Salt fileserver (or a local file on the minion), the mode of the destination file will be set to the mode of the source file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且 source 是Salt文件服务器中的文件（或奴才上的本地文件），则目标文件的模式将设置为源文件的模式。

trans-unit.source: If True, and the named container already exists, andreplace is also set to True, then the container will be forcibly removed. Otherwise, the state will not proceed and will return a False result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 True ，并且指定的容器已经存在，并且 replace 也设置为 True ，则将强制删除该容器。否则，状态将不会继续，并且将返回 False 结果。

trans-unit.source: If True, and the network is in the global scope, non-service containers on worker nodes will be able to connect to the network.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且网络处于全局范围内，则工作节点上的非服务容器将能够连接到网络。

trans-unit.source: If True, and this function would update the package version, any packages held using the yum/dnf "versionlock" plugin will be unheld so that they can be updated. Otherwise, if this function attempts to update a held package, the held package(s) will be skipped and an error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且此函数将更新软件包的版本，那么使用yum / dnf“ versionlock”插件保存的所有软件包都将被取消保留，以便可以对其进行更新。否则，如果此函数尝试更新保留的程序包，则将跳过保留的程序包并引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If True, and this function would update the package version, any packages which are being held will be temporarily unheld so that they can be updated. Otherwise, if this function attempts to update a held package, the held package(s) will be skipped and the state will fail. By default, this parameter is set to False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，并且此函数将更新软件包的版本，则将暂时取消保留任何保留的软件包，以便可以对其进行更新。否则，如果此函数尝试更新保留的软件包，则将跳过保留的软件包，并且状态将失败。默认情况下，此参数设置为 False 。

trans-unit.source: If True, append the specified group(s). Otherwise, this function will replace the user's groups with the specified group(s).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则附加指定的组。否则，此功能将用指定的组替换用户的组。

trans-unit.source: If True, cancel ongoing scrub
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则取消正在进行的清理

trans-unit.source: If True, checks for networks with duplicate names. Since networks are primarily keyed based on a random ID and not on the name, and network name is strictly a user-friendly alias to the network which is uniquely identified using ID, there is no guaranteed way to check for duplicates. This option providess a best effort, checking for any networks which have the same name, but it is not guaranteed to catch all name collisions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则检查名称重复的网络。由于网络主要是基于随机ID而不是名称进行密钥设置，并且网络名称严格来说是使用ID唯一标识的网络用户友好别名，因此无法保证检查重复项的方法。此选项可提供最大的努力，检查名称相同的任何网络，但不能保证捕获所有名称冲突。

trans-unit.source: If True, cleans after installation. Equivalent to running make install clean BATCH=yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则在安装后清除。等同于运行 make install clean BATCH=yes 。

trans-unit.source: If True, clears the builder cache
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则清除构建器缓存

trans-unit.source: If True, compare staged changes to item1 (if specified), otherwise compare them to the most recent commit.
trans-unit.target: 如果 True ，比较上演变为 item1 （如果指定），否则比较它们最近的提交。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则仅返回已删除（但未清除）的软件包。

trans-unit.source: If True, then return all worktrees tracked under $GIT_DIR/worktrees, including ones for which the gitdir is no longer present.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则返回$ GIT_DIR / worktrees下跟踪的所有工作树，包括不再存在gitdir的工作树。

trans-unit.source: If True, then the container will be started to retrieve the info. A Started key will be in the return data if the container was started.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则将启动容器以检索信息。一 Started 重点将是在返回数据，如果容器已启动。

trans-unit.source: If True, then this function will determine the best common ancestors of all specified commits, in preparation for an n-way merge. See here for a description of how these bases are determined.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将确定所有指定提交的最佳公共祖先，以准备进行n次合并。有关如何确定这些基准的说明，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: If True, then this function will report what would have been pruned, but no changes will be made.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将报告本应修剪的内容，但不会进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: If True, then when a fetch is performed all tags will be fetched, even those which are not reachable by any branch on the remote.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则在执行提取操作时，将提取所有标记，即使那些远程分支上无法访问的标记也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If True, this IP address will be added to the interface. Default is False, which overrides any existing configuration for the interface and sets addr as the only address on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此IP地址将添加到接口。默认值为 False ，它将覆盖该接口的任何现有配置，并将 addr 设置为该接口上的唯一地址。

trans-unit.source: If True, this function will block until the container exits and return the logs when it does. The default behavior is to return what is in the log at the time this function is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将阻塞直到容器退出并在容器退出时返回日志。默认行为是返回执行此功能时日志中的内容。

trans-unit.source: If True, this function will not wait for the container to exit and will not return its logs. It will however return the container's name and ID, allowing for docker.logs to be used to view the logs.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将不等待容器退出并且不会返回其日志。但是，它将返回容器的名称和ID，从而允许使用 docker.logs 查看日志。

trans-unit.source: If True, this function will return the IDs of the refs/commits passed which cannot be reached by another commit.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将返回传递的引用/提交的ID，而其他提交无法到达该ID。

trans-unit.source: If True, this function will simply return the number of processes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则此函数将仅返回进程数。

trans-unit.source: If True, this will set a global git config option
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，这将设置一个全局git config选项

trans-unit.source: If True, unset all matches
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则取消设置所有匹配项

trans-unit.source: If True, unset set a global variable. Otherwise, a local variable will be unset.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则取消设置全局变量。否则，将不会设置局部变量。

trans-unit.source: If True, untagged images will also be returned
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，还将返回未标记的图像

trans-unit.source: If True, untagged parent image layers will be removed as well, set this to False to keep them.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则也将删除未标记的父图像层，请将其设置为 False 即可保留它们。

trans-unit.source: If True, usage will be in KB/MB/GB etc.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则使用量将以KB / MB / GB等为单位。

trans-unit.source: If True, use the default subnetpool for ip_version to obtain a CIDR. It is required to pass None to the cidr argument when enabling this option.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则将默认的子网池用于 ip_version 以获得CIDR。启用此选项时，需要将 None 传递给 cidr 参数。

trans-unit.source: If True, will attempt to de-duplicate and consolidate sources
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，将尝试去重复和合并源

trans-unit.source: If True: an API_Response key will be present in the return data, containing the raw output from the Docker API.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则返回数据中将包含一个 API_Response 密钥，其中包含Docker API的原始输出。

trans-unit.source: If __env__ is specified as the branch name, then git_pillar will decide which branch to use based on the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 如果将 __env__ 指定为分支名称，则git_pillar将根据以下条件决定使用哪个分支：

trans-unit.source: If all is specified, all valid attributes will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 all 指定，将返回所有有效属性。

trans-unit.source: If cert_filename is
trans-unit.target: 如果 cert_filename 是

trans-unit.source: If changes is used, then terse output will be used if there was no error and no changes, otherwise full output will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了 changes ，那么如果没有错误并且没有更改，那么将使用简洁的输出，否则将使用完整的输出。

trans-unit.source: If containers is not used, and the network is replaced, then Salt will keep track of the containers which were connected to the network and reconnect them to the network after it is replaced. Salt will first attempt to reconnect using the same IP the container had before the network was replaced. If that fails (for instance, if the network was replaced because the subnet was modified), then the container will be reconnected without an explicit IP address, and its IP will be assigned by Docker.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用 containers ，并且更换了网络，则Salt将跟踪已连接到网络的容器，并在更换后将它们重新连接到网络。Salt将首先尝试使用与更换网络之前容器相同的IP重新连接。如果失败（例如，如果由于修改了子网而更换了网络），则将在没有显式IP地址的情况下重新连接容器，并且Docker将分配其IP。

trans-unit.source: If delete_policies: False is specified, existing policies that are not in the given list of policies will not be deleted. This allows manual modifications on the IAM role to be persistent. This functionality was added in 2015.8.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 delete_policies: False ，则不在给定策略列表中的现有策略将不会被删除。这允许对IAM角色的手动修改得以持久。此功能已在2015.8.0中添加。

trans-unit.source: If file1 is an http(s)/ftp URL and the file exists in the minion's file cache, this option can be passed to keep the minion from re-downloading the archive if the cached copy matches the specified hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果 file1 是http（s）/ ftp URL，并且文件存在于奴才的文件缓存中，则可以通过传递此选项来防止奴才重新下载存档（如果缓存的副本与指定的哈希匹配）。

trans-unit.source: If file2 is an http(s)/ftp URL and the file exists in the minion's file cache, this option can be passed to keep the minion from re-downloading the archive if the cached copy matches the specified hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果 file2 是http（s）/ ftp URL，并且文件存在于minion的文件缓存中，则可以通过传递此选项，以使minion如果缓存的副本与指定的哈希值匹配，则不会重新下载存档。

trans-unit.source: If filter is used, then either or both of two different filters can be used: exclude or terse.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 filter ，则可以使用两个不同过滤器中的一个或两个： exclude 或 terse 。

trans-unit.source: If force is True no checks will be made and the repository will be generated if allow_empty is True then the state will not return an error if there are 0 packages,
trans-unit.target: 如果 force 为 True ,则将不进行任何检查；如果 allow_empty 为 True ,则将生成存储库，那么，如果有0个软件包，则状态不会返回错误，

trans-unit.source: If found is False, then a second key called suggestions will be present, which will contain a list of possible matches. This list will be empty if the package name was specified in category/pkgname format, since the suggestions are only intended to disambiguate ambiguous package names (ones submitted without a category).
trans-unit.target: 如果 found 为 False ，则将显示另一个名为 suggestions 键，其中将包含可能的匹配项列表。如果软件包名称是以 category/pkgname 格式指定的，则此列表将为空，因为建议仅用于消除歧义的软件包名称（不带类别的软件包名称）。

trans-unit.source: If host is a vCenter host, then use esxi_hosts to execute this function on a list of one or more ESXi machines.
trans-unit.target: 如果 host 是vCenter主机，请使用esxi_hosts在一台或多台ESXi计算机的列表上执行此功能。

trans-unit.source: If keep_newline is set to True, then the pillar values for files ending in newlines will keep that newline. The default behavior is to remove the end-of-file newline. keep_newline should be turned on if the pillar data is intended to be used to deploy a file using contents_pillar with a file.managed state.
trans-unit.target: 如果 keep_newline 设置为 True ，则以换行符结尾的文件的支柱值将保留该换行符。默认行为是删除文件结束换行符。 keep_newline 应如果支柱数据旨在被用于部署使用文件被打开 contents_pillar 与 file.managed 状态。

trans-unit.source: If merge_lists=True, will aggregate list object types instead of replace. The list in upd is added to the list in dest, so the resulting list is dest[key] + upd[key]. This behaviour is only activated when recursive_update=True. By default merge_lists=False.
trans-unit.target: 如果 merge_lists=True ，将聚合列表对象类型而不是替换。将 upd 中的列表添加到 dest 中的列表中，因此结果列表为 dest[key] + upd[key] 。仅当 recursive_update=True 时才激活此行为。默认情况下， merge_lists=False 。

trans-unit.source: If merge_lists=True, will aggregate list object types instead of replacing. This behavior is only activated when recursive_update=True.
trans-unit.target: 如果 merge_lists=True ，将聚合列表对象类型而不是替换。仅当 recursive_update=True 时才激活此行为。

trans-unit.source: If mixed is used, then terse output will be used unless a state failed, in which case full output will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mixed ，那么除非状态失败，否则将使用简洁的输出，在这种情况下，将使用完整的输出。

trans-unit.source: If mode=insert is used, at least one of the following options must also be defined: location, before, or after. If location is used, it takes precedence over the other two options.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mode=insert ,则还必须至少定义以下选项之一： location ， before 或 after 。如果使用 location ，则它优先于其他两个选项。

trans-unit.source: If name contains a "?" or "*" then it will re-start a group of VMs which have been paused or stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果 name 包含“？” 或“ *”，它将重新启动一组已暂停或停止的虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: If name is an http(s) or ftp URL and the file exists in the minion's file cache, this option can be passed to keep the minion from re-downloading the file if the cached copy matches the specified hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果 name 是http（s）或ftp URL，并且文件存在于minion的文件缓存中，则可以通过传递此选项，以使minion如果缓存的副本与指定的哈希值匹配，则不会重新下载文件。

trans-unit.source: If name is an http(s)/ftp URL and the file exists in the minion's file cache, this option can be passed to keep the minion from re-downloading the archive if the cached copy matches the specified hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果 name 是http（s）/ ftp URL，并且文件存在于minion的文件缓存中，则可以通过传递此选项来防止minion在缓存的副本与指定的哈希匹配时重新下载存档。

trans-unit.source: If passwd isn't found in the roster, a default SSH password can be set here. Keep in mind that ssh_password will not override the roster passwd value if it is already defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 roster 找不到 passwd ,则可以在此处设置默认的SSH密码。请记住， ssh_password 不会覆盖名册 passwd 值（如果已定义）。

trans-unit.source: If path is an http(s) or ftp URL and the file exists in the minion's file cache, this option can be passed to keep the minion from re-downloading the file if the cached copy matches the specified hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 是http（s）或ftp URL，并且文件存在于minion的文件缓存中，则可以通过传递此选项来防止minion在缓存的副本与指定的哈希匹配时重新下载文件。

trans-unit.source: If prefix is not specified it defaults to the basename of the repo directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 prefix ,则默认为repo目录的基本名称。
